title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 612.2 - Term of appointments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 612.2 - Term of appointments

State Regulations

Appointments of attorneys to any of
the Indigent Defendant Legal Panels shall be for an indefinite term subject to
recertification as directed by the justices of the Appellate Division, First

Department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
612.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
